title: New Tab page doesn't show background images (only gray) - Light mode is a little broken
content:
Problems:

  1. The New Tab page doesn't show background images - doesn't go into Light Mode
  2. When Light Mode is enabled, certain UI related to Firefox-related pages break

Did I accidentally touch some CSS or about:config elements I wasn't supposed to? I honestly don't know lol


Additional Notes:

  • Applies to custom and default backgrounds (the author's info shows up)
  • "Reset to default" didn't help
  • I removed all extensions
  • Themes work fine - Issue happens with or without them enabled
  • Everything else on New Tab works fine
  • Provided screenshots showcasing it all (including Light Mode oddities)
creator: alejandromartinez2125
